summary: This appears to be a draft FBI 302 form documenting an interview with corrections officers regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody. The document is part of the investigation into Epstein's death at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the investigation, died while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Interview of Corrections Officers
events.description: FBI agents interview corrections officers regarding the circumstances of Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Epstein's Death in Custody
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, prompting an investigation.

keyFacts: The document is a draft FBI 302 form, indicating it is a record of an interview conducted by federal agents.
The interview subject appears to be corrections officers, suggesting the focus is on Epstein's death while in custody.
The document is dated August 30, 2019, shortly after Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The document is part of the investigation into the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The document originates from the FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force.
